data.text:
@iamKeiC1 -There are also restrictions on the type of food, especially for those producing foul smell (i.e., durian, etc.). 
Hope this helps.

@iamKeiC1 -Frozen food must be allowed by the local government unit of your origin &destination. There are some airport stations that do not allow pork, fruits, chicken, etc.
-Some cooling agents /refrigerants may be considered as Dangerous Goods which may be allowed in limited quantities.

data.text: @iamKeiC1 Hi iamKeiC. You can bring frozen food in your checked baggage, as long as it is packed properly and sealed to avoid spillage and emission of odors. Please consider the following guidelines:

data.text: @green9water You're most welcome ムダ太!
@green9water This includes most wheeled cabin bags and backpacks. The carry-on baggage must fit inside the overhead bin and must be stowed by yourself.

@green9water Hi ムダ太! If you availed CEB Prepaid baggage, any side of your 1 piece check in baggage shall not exceed 39inches or 99.06cm. While for handcarry, you are allowed one (1) carry-on baggage inside the cabin, with maximum weight of 7 kgs and dimension of up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm.

data.text: @green9water Hi ムダ太. May we clarify if which is your concern? Is it check in baggage or hand carry?

@green9water Hi ムダ太! Checked Baggage should not exceed 39 inches on all sides. Any excess in piece, weight, and size (baggage that exceeds 39 inches) are subject to existing Extra Bag Fee, Excess Baggage Fee, and/or Oversized Baggage Fee, respectively.

@jakepels Hi jake. We accept electronic devices as long as they are in your checked baggage and don't exceed the baggage allowance availed. Please ensure your device is properly packed, even better if it's in the original packaging.

@DanielPaterson2 Hi Daniel! Flat screen TV is not allowed in your checked baggage due to the possibility of damages. You may inquire thru our Cargo Team in CGY if they may accept it: scargocarecgy@cebupacificair.com | +63 998 840 3492. See you!

data.text: @markyexplorerRL You're most welcome Marky!

@norwejean Hi jed. Food for personal consumption is allowed in your hand carry as long as it does not emit strong odors (i.e., dried fish, atchara, shrimp paste, etc.). Please ensure that it's properly packed and sealed to avoid any spills in the cabin. See you!
@NoiNoi9987 Hi Noi. Can I have your case number or Chat session number so I could do a follow-up with the agent? It is in your email subject.

@JDiamante6 I'm sorry to hear this JDiamante. We will help you look into it. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

@LZblowsdaebulge Hi mama hoe! Liquor may be accepted for check-in only and its alcohol content should not exceed 70%. The maximum amount per passenger is 5L. Please make sure it's in its original retail packaging and that it's sealed and packed properly to avoid spillage.

data.text: @ItsMeeMaine Thank you for raising the concern, Maine. To check on the concern further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@seulgisvibrato Thanks for raising the concern, seulgisvibrato. To check on it, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and chat with our live chat agents or send an email thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.
@norwejean You're welcome, jed. Have a great day!
@PaulGardon Hi Paul! If you avail of the CEB Flexi upon booking, you will be given the option to convert your booking into travel fund. Otherwise, only rebooking is allowed. Thank you

@thisisyourLOLA We are very glad to hear this and thank you as well for the appreciation, @thisisyourLOLA. We'll share this with the relevant team. Again, thank you and hope to see you again onboard soon!
@NoiNoi9987 We are truly sorry for the inconvenience. Appreciate if you could send the case number of the latest email you have so we can check on it? Thank you
@aizle36180529 You're welcome and have a good day, @aizle36180529!
@kiaraelluna We are thankful for the appreciation, Kiara. We'll continue doing our best in improving our service for our valued passengers. Thank you again and have a good day!
@norwejean Hi jed! Bringing pf empty tumbler may be allowed for hand carry. You may put it inside your bag. Thank you

@elijahnisms Thank you for raising the concern, @elijahnisms. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@aqxiijen Thank you for reaching to us, jnsjn. To check on your concern, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@PaulGardon As advised, ticket is non-reroutable. Thus, you cannot change the origin or destination. Ticket may only be rebooked (change in date or time) subject to fare difference. Thank you

@aizle36180529 Hi @aizle36180529! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@PaulGardon Hi Paul1 Kindly note that tickets are non-reroutable. This can only be rebooked voluntarily subject to fare difference. Thank you

@NoiNoi9987 Thanks for raising the concern and we are sorry for the inconvenience, Noi Noi. For us to assist you and check on your concern, kindly send an email thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.
@kirkycrunchy Thank you for raising the concern, kd. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@ChonnieDavid Hi Chonnie. We will be glad to look into it. To further assist you and the security of your personal information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wDXJv . Or, send us a private message via: https://t.co/gNaqWVnrV6. Thanks!

data.text: @ItsMeeMaine Hi Maine! Tel here. Please be advised that for voluntary rebooking, rebooking penalty and fare difference will apply. Thank you!

data.text: @mat_cruise Hi Mat! Tel here. Regret if you feel that way. Rest assured that we continue to listen and improve our services so we can deliver the best experience for everyJuan.

data.text: @totalBPM Your feedback is appreciated and we'll note of this. Hope that you give us another opportunity to be of better service with you again. Have a good day!
@totalBPM Thank you for raising the concern, Patrick. We are doing our best to enhance and improve more our chatbot in able to attend and assist more the passenger's concern.
@omatuszewskii We are sorry to hear your dismay, Oskar. May we have the Customer Care Reference Number of the email you sent so we can revisit the case? Thank you

@iamkimtheking We are sorry to hear your frustrations, @iamkimtheking. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@AGVelez4 Hi AV! Yes, E-Cigarettes or vapes are allowed in your hand carry. Please ensure to remove the batteries before packing. Thank you

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: @Gadolt Hi Choi! Kindly note that ticket cannot be rebooked to a promo, another promo or any fare lower than the amount initially paid. Thus, rebooking fee may indeed be the same amount of the existing booking or higher. Thank you
@NoiNoi9987 Hi Noi! Tel here. Sorry to hear about this. May I ask if you were able to link your account to Go Rewards? Thank you!

@jdsobrecarey Hello L.A.! If you wish to book for a specific fare, route and/or flight schedule, please visit our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWAGam.  For the latest seat sale, you may refer to https://t.co/kGsg6DVkSv. Thank you and hope to see you onboard!

@jdsobrecarey Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, Joyce. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@DRPCuasay Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, DRPCuasay. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@exolodi Glad to hear this, exolodi. You're welcome and have a great day ahead!
